effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.x_y: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
